name: In The Tower
description:
Your job is to escape the tower alive from the horrors that live within. Light all the candles and open the hatches to make your way to the bottom of the tower

Have fun and enjoy! 
We had a lot more in mind, but alas time was not our friend :D

Gameplay Notes:

  1. Enemies are sensitive to sound and will move towards you when you are in range.
  2. You have to light all the candles in the level before opening the hatch.
  3. Hold down the interact button to open the hatch.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Space/"O" to interact
